title: Alive and Well Deli and Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, International, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Deli and juice bar cafe located inside the Alive & Well health food store. Small, casual seating area. Offers fresh fruit and veggies juices, smoothies, wraps, salads, hot plate lunches, sushi, and desserts.
